name: ShadowStalk
description:
Shadowstalk is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game prototype where a team of four players take the role of Shades, who must escape from Limbo while being pursued by the other player taking the reigns of a towering, lumbering Monster.

In a dangerous game of cat and mouse, the Shades must race around a forgotten hospital collecting keys and evading the Monster with the hopes of opening a portal to safety.

The Shades' eyes produce light however, which means they have to remove their greatest sense, their sight, to hide.

If all four Shades can escape in time, they win! But those who fall by the monster's hands are eliminated from the game, their souls consumed.
